verbs.description: attorney general [V: will] appeal abelove dismissal the state attorney general office on tuesday filed a notice that it will appeal a judge dismissal of a criminal indictment against rensselaer county district attorney joel e abelove the notice filed in rensselaer county follows the june 11 dismissal of criminal charges accusing abelove of lying to a grand jury and manipulating an investigation in which a troy police sergeant was cleared of wrongdoing in the fatal 2016 shooting of an unarmed dwi suspect albany joel e abelove attorney general barbara d underwood troy alabama supreme court of the united states perjury jonathan d nichols edson thevenin abelove amy spitalnick rensselaer county new york
